content.rendered:
Designed to provide a visible “face lift”, reducing the appearance of ageing by hydrating and smoothing wrinkles and fine lines.

This daily serum is infused with key antioxidants including bioactive native extracts of Kakadu Plum, Mountain Pepper Leaf and Blue Cypress Wood combined with four active anti-ageing cosmeceutical peptides to boost collagen and elastin production promoting youthful, radiant skin.

*Decreased wrinkle volume by 20.6% and length by 15.9% after 1 week. Reduction of 17% in wrinkle depth after 15 days. 20% reduction in wrinkle volume and 15% reduction in wrinkle depth over 60 days.

For ageing skin with visible signs of ageing including loss of tone and elasticity.

excerpt.rendered:
• Plumping and hydrating effect for ageing skin
  • Fortified with age-defying peptides
  • Boosts collagen and elastin, hydrate and smooth fine lines
  • Maintains a smooth, firm and youthful complexion
  • Immediate and long-lasting moisturisation
  • Reduces the visible appearance of lines and wrinkles
  • Provides antioxidant protection
